## Source.(constructor)

Creates a new Source server query instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(host: string, port: number, timeout?: number, debug?: boolean);
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

</td><td>

</td><td>

</td><td>

The port number of the server.

<tr><td>

timeout


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The timeout duration (in milliseconds) for server queries. Default is 5000.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

debug


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Enables debug logging if true. Default is false.
